title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.23 - Accounting functionality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.23 - Accounting functionality

State Regulations
A MCS shall have an application or facility that allows
controlled access to all accounting (financial) information and shall be able
to create all mandatory reports in the reporting requirements under section
5317.32
and any additional reports
the commission may require. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.23

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
